text: hi all! Does anyone have a good suggestion here? Situation: client has about 1300 SKUs he’s loading into HubDB via CSV import. Each individual product calls for two images and two pdfs, none of which are in HubSpot yet. Is there any possible way he can avoid having to manually upload and link these 4000+ files one-by-one? Thank you!

New. mac mini, trying to set up the terminal & running into some issues.
